title: @Meddler: did you really add a delay to seeing camouflaged units?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/dfzaVZY.gif/img

There is a delay after coming into range of Twisted Fate before the "!" appears above Twitch's head.

This doesn't happen with live Evelynn.

Is this:

1) New?

2) A bug?

or 

3) A misrepresentation of when Twitch is actually seen? (ie: is Twisted Fate seeing Twitch before Twitch sees the "!")?

Also: Does the same apply to Evelynn?

Gameplay mirror: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/9pVFmIHc-meddler-did-you-really-add-a-delay-to-seeing-camouflaged-units
